articles.author: Eustance Huang
articles.title: Japan's Nikkei 225 falls 1% as Asia-Pacific markets slip despite record high close for S&P 500 - CNBC
articles.description: The S&P 500 and Nasdaq Composite both closed at record highs overnight on Wall Street.
articles.content:
SINGAPORE Shares in Asia-Pacific fell in Tuesday morning trade despite gains overnight on Wall Street as the S&P 500 and Nasdaq Composite closed at record highs.

articles.description: It was billed as Asia's first all-in-one transit application and the next big disruptor in the land transport sector here.. Read more at straitstimes.com.
articles.content:
